availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William P. Aker (Pulaski County, Kentucky, resident and soldier)

body.p: Pulaski County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Kentucky native. Resident in Pulaski County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 30th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) as a sergeant from January 1, 1864 to April 18, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski County, District 1, p. 341.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski County, District 1, p. 227.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 398.
